titles.title: Dakaretai Otoko 1-i ni Odosarete Imasu.
抱かれたい男1位に脅されています.
Dakaichi: I`m Being Harassed by the Sexiest Man of the Year
안기고 싶은 남자 1위에게 협박당하고 있습니다
我让最想被拥抱的男人给威胁了。

anime.description: * Based on a BL manga written and drawn by http://anidb.net/cr54298 [Sakurabi Hashigo]. http://anidb.net/ch94824 [Saijyo Takato] has reigned as the idol industry`s "Most Huggable" for five years, that is, until freshman actor http://anidb.net/ch94822 [Azumaya Junta] appeared. Takato was always considered brusque while Azumaya`s smile is winning over admirers by comparison. The whole fiasco drives Takuto to over indulge in alcohol and his actions catch the attention of the last person he wants to see. To his surprise, Azumaya uses this new info to blackmail Takuto for physical affection. Source: ANN Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event held at five locations in Japan on 29.09.2018.

externalentity.identifier: 抱かれたい男1位に脅されています。
我讓最想被擁抱的男人給威脅了。

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

episode.title: 芸能界は喰うか喰われるか.
In Show Business, It`s Either Eat or Be Eaten.
Geinoukai wa Kuu ka Kuwareru ka.
episode.summary: Enter the cut-throat world of the entertainment industry, where the two most desirable men find themselves in a forbidden scandal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あいつ, もう俺に飽きやがったのか.
I Guess He`s Already Over Me.
Aitsu, Mou Ore ni Akiyagatta no ka.
episode.summary: Junta keeps following around Takato, but then one day, Junta begins to avoid Takato for a strange reason. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チカン, ダメ, ゼッタイ.
Molesting. Just Don`t Do It.
Chikan, Dame, Zettai.
episode.summary: Junta and Takato are busy filming "Mid-afternoon Star" while also publicizing the movie. Eventually, though, the shoot wraps… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハメられたああぁぁ.
I`ve Been Framed...
Hameraretaaaaa.
Opening
Ending
俺の女にしてあげますよ.
I Can Make You My Woman.
Ore no Onna ni Shite Agemasu yo.
episode.summary: Junta has to go location shooting and won`t be able to see Takato for four whole days. Meanwhile, Takato starts rehearsing for his upcoming play, and the lead person for this play is… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なんでコイツとホテルで一緒に... まさか... いやいやいやないよな? そんな... そん....
Why Am I at a Hotel with Him... Did We... There`s No Way... Is There!?
Nande Koitsu to Hotel de Issho ni... Masaka... Iya Iya Iya Nai yo na? Sonna... Son....
episode.summary: A wasted Takato has spent the night with Ayagi. The next morning, Takato looks at his phone and sees that Junta had been trying to contact him all night… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 好きでいてもいいですか.
Can I Keep Liking You?
Suki de Ite mo Ii Desuka.
episode.summary: The two first met on the set of "Vial of Sun," the TV drama in which Junta is making his acting debut. During the shoot, while interacting with Takato for the first time, Junta gets the distinct impression that he’s hated. And yet, at the same time, he has feelings that he’s never experienced before. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ず, ずらすな, 海パンずらすな.
H-Hands Off My Swim Trunks.
Zu, Zurasuna, Kaipan Zurasuna.
episode.summary: Takato was working on a commercial in Hawaii, but being a superstar competent actor, he finished two days early. Wanting to spend the remaining two days relaxing, he "coincidentally" runs into not only Junta, but into Chihiro and Narumiya as well. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ......仲がいいことで.
...I Guess You Two Are Close.
......Naka ga Ii Koto de.
episode.summary: With "The Red Leaf Ogre" opening soon, Takato finds himself busier than ever with rehearsals and TV show appearances. Amid all the hubbub, he looks back to a year ago, when he first met Azumaya. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 別れるぞ, チュン太.
We`re Breaking Up, Chunta.
Wakaruzo, Chunta.
episode.summary: Junta is overjoyed when he finds out that "Midday Star" has been approved for a sequel, and he can co-star with Takato again! However, they may have let their guards down for a brief moment, and the photographer didn`t miss that chance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そんなに俺に惚れてんなら, 飽きるまで抱かせてやるよ.
If You`re That in Love with Me, You Can Have Your Way with Me Until You`re Done.
Sonna ni Ore ni Horetennara, Akiru made Dakasete Yaru yo.
episode.summary: A scandalous picture of Takato with Junta has been published in the tabloids. With suspicions of "Forbidden Love," Takato becomes the target of society`s attention in a negative way. How will Junta and Takato fair in this storm? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: mi tesoro.
Mi Tesoro.
Mi Tesoro.
episode.summary: Takato focuses on work, but is uninterested. For the first time, he speaks about his feelings for Junta to Mr. Sasaski. Meanwhile, Junta is coming up with a plan. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ふっふっふ~ん♪ふっふっふ~ん♪ふっふっふ~ふふ~ん.
Fu-fu-fuuuun
Fuffuffuun Fuffuffuun Fuffuffuufufuun.
episode.summary: Takato blusters about coming up with the plans for Christmas Eve, but then works non-stop with no holiday inspirations coming to him. His anxiety ratchets up when Junta doesn’t show up on Christmas Eve. Source: crunchyroll
